attributes.action: Provide more facilities within the community that offer illicit drug treatment and detoxification.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The cost of keeping a person in prison is about £35000 per year saying nothing of the cost of the offending behaviour.
80% of those entering prison are through crimes related to their drug addiction for which many want help but cannot get it in the community. If support was readily available in the community it would reduce crime, the prison population would go down and everyone would benefit.
